question: Can you use the credits hosted on [Cyberfeeder](https://netrunnerdb.com/en/card/25008) to pay for [Femme Fatale](https://netrunnerdb.com/en/card/31022)â€™s bypass ability?
answer: Yes. Since the bypass ability is an optional ability, you are considered to be using the ability. The credits from [Cyberfeeder](https://netrunnerdb.com/en/card/25008) can be spent to pay for the use of that ability.
